Name: Elwyn Brook-Jones
Notes: West End , film and TV actor , whose roles included The Voice ( the hero 's opponent ) in the children 's TV series Garry Halliday

Name: Ian Gillies
Notes: Quiz question-setter , who was Mycroft on BBC Radio 4 's Brain of Britain

Name: Arturo Goetz
Notes: Argentinian actor who studied for a DPhil in Economics , but his scholarship finished before his thesis was complete

Name: Glyn Mathias
Notes: Political Editor of Independent Television News ( 1981-1986 ) and BBC Wales ( 1994-1999 ) ; the Electoral Commission 's Commissioner for Wales ( 2001-2008 )

Name: Norman Matthews
Notes: Chancellor of Llandaff Cathedral ( 1952-1964 ) and one of the panellists on the BBC show The Brains Trust

Name: Kirsty McCabe
Notes: BBC national weather forecaster on radio and television

Name: Andre Ptaszynski
Notes: Television and theatre producer , and Chief Executive of the Really Useful Group

Notes: Journalist and broadcaster ; the college 's first female honorary fellow

Name: William Terriss
Notes: Actor , known for his swashbuckling roles , who was murdered outside the Adelphi Theatre in 1897 by an unstable and struggling actor

Name: John Wood
Notes: Actor , member of the Royal Shakespeare Company and Tony Award winner in 1976
